subject: feat(pwa): add update notification, cross-browser install, standalone detection
body:
Six PWA improvements:

1. Switch registerType from autoUpdate to prompt â€” users see an
   "Update Available" button and control when reloads happen.
2. Add usePWAUpdate hook with 60-minute periodic SW update checks.
3. Add usePWAInstall hook with UA-based browser detection (Chrome,
   Edge, Brave, Safari, Firefox), standalone mode detection via
   display-mode media query + iOS navigator.standalone.
4. Add InstallInstructionsModal with step-by-step guides for Safari
   (iOS + macOS) and Firefox (Android + desktop).
5. Add maskable icon entry to manifest for adaptive Android icons.
6. Add install analytics tracking in localStorage (last 50 events).
